name: Starlight Mayhem Reboot
description:
one day you decide to take your girlfriend to a local music festival to listen to some funky tunes, but what's this?! The current lead singer from the band 'On command' recognizes you from the crowd! Here comes CJ, a cute light headed band boy who has heard of your many music ventures, so he challenges you to a battle! will you be able to overcome the mayhem on this starry night?

This mod adds:

- 8 New funky songs!
- a whole new week featuring stylish cutscenes!

- Brand new Bonus week with special guests as musicians!
- Fully charted Easy, Normal, and Hard mode!
- Brand new funky menu!
- And much more stuff!
